title: AKShare Data Explorer
subtitle: 400+ Financial Data Endpoints
description: Access comprehensive financial data covering bonds, derivatives, economics, funds, and alternative data from Chinese and global markets.

bonds.name: Bonds
bonds.description: Chinese & International bond markets, yield curves, government & corporate bonds

derivatives.name: Derivatives
derivatives.description: Options, futures, Greeks, volatility, spreads from Chinese exchanges

chinaEconomics.name: China Economics
chinaEconomics.description: Chinese macro indicators: GDP, CPI, PPI, PMI, money supply, trade data

globalEconomics.name: Global Economics
globalEconomics.description: US, Eurozone, UK, Japan, Australia, Canada macro data & global indicators

funds.name: Funds
funds.description: ETF analytics, mutual funds, fund ratings, risk metrics, flows

alternative.name: Alternative Data
alternative.description: Air quality, carbon trading, energy, real estate, auto sales, sentiment

analysis.name: Market Analysis
analysis.description: Technical analysis, market breadth, sector rotation, smart money

panels.noFavorites: No favorites yet. Click the bookmark icon on any endpoint to add it here.
